comments.raw_text:
I disagree with the premise of this bug. Fullscreen doesn't mean "don't show URLs when you hover" 

We have kiosk mode for that now.
Bug 1622325 seems like it was something different. The cursor was not over a link, but the URL was still showing when they were on the HBO go site. That seems worth investigating.
